#summary jbullet-jme features

==Implemented Features==
 * PhysicsNodes (RigidBodys)
 * applying forces
 * CollisionShapes
   * Box
   * Sphere
   * Capsule
   * Cylinder
   * Mesh
 * [PhysicsJoint Joints]
   * HingeJoint (incl. motors)
   * Point2PointJoint
   * SliderJoint (incl. motors)
   * ConeJoint
   * 6DofJoint (incl motors)
 * CollisionEvents
 * [PhysicsVehicleNode Vehicles]
 * Character Nodes
 * [Multithreading GameTaskQueue] for optional multithreading
